block.p: Nina Hoffman, a publisher, was married yesterday to Howard Blatt, a reporter. Both work in New York. Rabbi Paul Brickman officiated at the Water's Edge restaurant in Long Island City, Queens.

Ms. Hoffman, who is 40, is keeping her name. She is the president and publisher of Prentice Hall General Reference, a division of Paramount Consumer Publishing. She graduated from the State University at New Paltz. Ms. Hoffman is the daughter of the late Milton and Minnie Hoffman.
